title: Deployer duty: perform fundamental rights impact assessment (FRIA) before first deployment where required

legal_consequence.verbatim: Prior to deploying a high-risk AI system referred to in Article 6(2), with the exception of high-risk AI systems intended to be used in the area listed in point 2 of Annex III, deployers that are bodies governed by public law, or are private entities providing public services, and deployers of high-risk AI systems referred to in points 5 (b) and (c) of Annex III, shall perform an assessment of the impact on fundamental rights that the use of such system may produce.

items.label: Assessment contents (a)-(f)
items.text: The FRIA shall include process description, period/frequency, affected groups, specific risks, human oversight implementation, and mitigation/complaint mechanisms.

items.label: Updates and reliance
items.text: FRIA applies to first use; reliance on previous FRIA is allowed in similar cases; update when elements change.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
